snippet: With Congress engaged in an all-consuming fight over financing the government, Treasury Secretary Jacob J. Lew has implored legislators not to forget about the country’s debt ceiling, which needs to be raised in a matter of weeks to avoid what...
abstract: With Congress engaged in an all-consuming fight over financing the government, Treasury Secretary Jacob J. Lew has implored legislators not to forget about the country’s debt ceiling, which needs to be raised in a matter of weeks to avoid what might be a financial market calamity.

headline.main: Lew Renews Warning to Lawmakers About Default
